pages.title: Apply to the 'Find an English-speaking translator or interpreter abroad’ service

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
Interpreters and translators based outside the UK can apply online to be added to the Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) 'Find an English-speaking interpreter or translator abroad' service.

This service provides lists of English-speaking interpreters and translators which are searchable by country and region to help British nationals find the support that best suits their needs.

To be eligible to be added to a list you need to be:

  • based in the country you provide services in
  • qualified to provide interpretation or translation services

You also need to be able to provide:

  • services and support to customers in English
  • reliable contact details, including an email address
! Warning You must have access to the email address you provide. You will be sent a link that you must use to complete your application.

components.name: QLkbfP
components.content:
Feedback on this service

If you have feedback specifically about this digital service, the FCDO welcomes your views.

Email: digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk

pages.title: Check your answers
Can you provide translation or interpretation services to customers in English?
You cannot be added to the service

components.name: WlXNxl
components.content: You can only be added to the 'Find an English-speaking translator or interpreter abroad' service if you can provide services to British nationals in English.

pages.title: Contact name

components.name: YBSPkn
components.content: Provide the full name of the person at your company who will act as the main point of contact with the British Embassy. This will not be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: Company name and address

components.name: mYwfbq
components.content: Provide an address to be listed on GOV.UK. If this is your home address, you can choose below how much of the address you want to be made public.

components.name: addressDisplay
components.title: How detailed do you want your address to appear on GOV.UK?
components.hint: If you choose to only have your town or city listed on GOV.UK, British nationals will still be shown their proximity to your actual address.

pages.title: Full website address (optional)

components.name: rCHsNQ
components.content:
Enter your full web address, for example: https://www.example.com or http://www.example.com.

If you do not know the full address, open your website in a new tab and copy the link.

pages.title: Email address

components.name: CetdZQ
components.content:
This email will be used:

  • to send you a link you must use in order to submit this application
  • by the British Embassy if they need to contact you about your application

components.name: publishEmail
components.title: Can we publish this email address on GOV.UK?
components.hint: We need an email address to publish on GOV.UK so that British nationals can contact you.

pages.title: What specialities do you provide translation in?

components.name: translationSpecialties
components.title: Translation specialities
components.hint: Select all specialities in which you provide a translation service

components.name: RuScuW
components.content: If you provide a different service that you think should be included in this list, email digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk.

pages.title: Are you a certified or sworn translator in your country?

components.name: swornTranslations
components.hint: If sworn or certified translation is not used in your country, select 'No'.
components.title: Are you a certified or sworn translator in your country?

pages.title: Have you provided services to British nationals before?

components.name: representedBritishNationals
components.title: Have you provided services to British nationals before?

pages.title: Phone number

components.name: RpnRxn
components.content: These details will be published on GOV.UK and used by British nationals to contact you.

components.name: phoneNumber
components.title: Phone number
components.hint: Include the country code, for example +49(0)74749561660

components.name: contactPhoneNumber
components.title: Emergency / out of hours number
components.hint: Only provide a number here if you can guarantee it will be answered outside of normal working hours.

pages.title: Which associations are you a part of?

components.name: regulators
components.hint: List any relevant independent national or international associations, unions or regulatory bodies. Provide the full title instead of an acronym.
components.title: Associations, unions or regulatory bodies

pages.title: Declaration

components.name: VUylUR
components.content:
By continuing you declare that you are:

  • currently qualified to provide translation or interpretation services
  • reliable and willing to help on a regular basis
  • able to respond within a reasonable timeframe to client requests
  • willing to update or re-confirm your details on an annual basis on request
  • aware that inclusion on the 'Find an English-speaking translator or interpreter abroad' service is not an endorsement by the FCDO and you are not affiliated to the FCDO in any way

pages.title: Which country list do you want to be added to?

components.name: ZoFnKT
components.content: ! Warning You must be based in the country or territory you select.

pages.title: Which areas of the country do you serve?

components.name: regions
components.title: Regions covered
components.hint: Include all areas in which you provide your services, for example cities, regions or the entire country.

pages.title: Email address for GOV.UK

components.name: publicEmailAddress
components.title: Email address (Public)
components.hint: Please provide the email address your company wishes to be contacted on by British nationals.

pages.title: You cannot be added to the list at this time

components.name: zcSPPo
components.content: This is a new service and is currently only taking applications from certain countries.

pages.title: What services do you provide?

components.name: servicesProvided
components.title: What services do you provide?
components.hint: Select all the services which you provide

pages.title: Which languages do you translate or interpret?

components.name: languagesProvided
components.title: Language
components.hint: Start typing and select a language. Add each language separately. Include all the languages you provide a service in, apart from English.

pages.title: What specialities do you provide interpretation in?

components.name: interpreterServices
components.title: Interpretation specialities
components.hint: Select all situations in which you can provide a service

components.name: SpiFhf
components.content: If you provide a different service that you think should be included in this list, email digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk.

pages.title: Are you a certified or sworn interpreter in your country?

components.name: swornInterpretations
components.hint: If sworn or certified interpretation is not used in your country, select 'No'.
components.title: Are you a certified or sworn interpreter in your country?

pages.title: How do you carry out your services?

components.name: deliveryOfServices
components.title: Where services can be carried out
components.hint: Select all that apply to you. If you provide 'In person' services you will be asked to give details of where you will travel.

pages.title: What specialities do you provide translation and interpretation in?

components.name: translationSpecialties
components.title: Translation services
components.hint: Select all specialities for which you provide translation of written content.

components.name: interpreterServices
components.hint: Select all situations in which you would provide interpretation of spoken language.
components.title: Interpretation services

pages.title: What size is your company or firm?

components.name: size
components.title: Size of company or firm
components.hint: The size of company is the number of professionals who can provide services, including freelancers and contractors.

pages.title: Are you a member of any professional associations?

components.name: memberOfProfessionalAssociations
components.hint: This includes any associations, unions or regulatory bodies that you think are relevant to your work. You will be asked to provide more details which will be published on GOV.UK.
components.title: Member of any associations?
